{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3498310,"name":"Zarif","username":"Zarif","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/z/9dc877/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-31T21:13:40.191Z","cooked":"

Hello, im having issues with my radio assistant tool. I have my radio getting power plugged into the rio port, and an ethernet from the radio connected to my laptop. When trying to use the radio assistant tool on the ethernet network interface I get the issue saying “configutation failed for interface: Ethernet. Ensure that the adapter is plugged into the DS or RIO port of the radio”.

Im not sure what the issue is.
We have tried multiple ethernet cables and it doesn’t seem to want to work.

Is it a school or work managed computer?

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2025-02-11T21:03:51.102Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":66,"readers_count":65,"score":33.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":484509,"topic_slug":"vivid-hosting-radio-assistant-tool-ethernet-connection-issue","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":71995,"username":"Zarif","name":"Zarif","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/z/9dc877/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":44480,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/vivid-hosting-radio-assistant-tool-ethernet-connection-issue/484509/4","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3524001,"name":"tkchan","username":"tkchan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/ee59a6/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-11T21:15:04.678Z","cooked":"

after you plug in the ethernet to the laptop and after you confirm that you have received an IP from the Radio. Have look and make sure that your network property isn’t on Public. If it is, switch it to Private. On Public mode, access to the ethernet is highly restricted and could be the problem.
